Härri during MFTS 2018 (2nd Symposium on Management of Future motorway and urban Traffic Systems) (Ispra, Italy). 3rd Prize Excellent Paper Award for "IoT device management framework for smart home scenarios" with T. Perumal and SK Datta during GCCE 2015. Best Paper Award for "The connectivity control framework: Enabling session continuity in multi-domain environments" with M. Wetterwald during MOBILITY 2014. Best Demo/Poster Award for "Modeling and Simulating ITS Applications with iTETRIS" with J. Härri during ACM MSWIM 2011. Best Paper Award  for the paper "Multicast and Virtual Road Side Units for Multi Technology Alert Messages Dissemination", with D. Câmara, M. Wetterwald and N. Nikaein during WIMAPS 2011. Best Technical Paper Award of the VTC Fall 2005, with J. Härri for "A lower bound for vehicles' trajectory duration".
